Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services

Interface EmailTemplateService

All Known Implementing Classes:
EmailTemplateServiceImpl
@Service public interface EmailTemplateService
Service Interface to manage email templates.

  • Method Details

    • createEmailTemplate

      EmailTemplate createEmailTemplate(CreateEmailTemplateDTO emailTemplateDTO) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      Create an Email Template.
      Parameters:
      emailTemplateDTO - representing the creation of an email template
      Returns:
      an EmailTemplate
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException

      Returns:

    • getAllEmailTemplate

      List<EmailTemplate> getAllEmailTemplate(Boolean hasPlaceholders)
      Retrieves email templates, opt. filtering by presence of placeholders.
      Parameters:
      hasPlaceholders - if true, filters templates with placeholders; returns all if false or null.
      Returns:
      a list of EmailTemplate objects.

    • updateEmailTemplate

      EmailTemplate updateEmailTemplate(UpdateEmailTemplateDTO updateDto) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      Updates an email template by its ID.
      Parameters:
      updateDto - data transfer object that has details of the email template to be updated
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the updated Email Template
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException
